resources.string: We\'re looking forward to hearing from you. \nEmail us to report bugs, suggest an improvement or if you want to add a translation. \nWe will be glad if you decide to rate and comment on our apps on Market.
Press it to start or continue counting time. \nIf you press it again when stopwatch is running it has no effect.
Press it to stop counting time. \nIf you press it again when stopwatch is not running it has no effect.
Press it to reset stopwatch. \nIf stopwatch was running before reset it continue to do so afterwards.
Stopwatch is working in background if you lock the screen or if you press device home button. \nHovewer, if you press back button stopwatch state is saved and it stopes running.
Anytime you live application, stopwatch state is saved and then restored when you run application again.

Accuracy of measured time depends on elapsed time. 
Concretely, at first stopwatch measures time up to 1 milisecond. 
After 10 minutes elapses, accuracy changes to 1 centisecond. 
After 100 minutes elapses, accuracy changes to 1 decisecond 
and finally, after 1000 minutes elapses, stopwatch is measuring time only up to 1 second.
